user.title: Set up Crestron XSIG
user.description: Configure the port for your Crestron XSIG gateway. Entity configuration will continue to use YAML (for now).

data_description.port: The UDP port for the XSIG gateway (typically 16384)

error.port_in_use: Port is already in use. Please choose a different port or stop the service using it.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This port is already configured. Use a different port for multiple Crestron systems.

init.title: Edit Crestron Hub Configuration
init.description:
Edit to_joins (HA→Crestron feedback) and from_joins (Crestron→HA scripts) in YAML format.

Currently: {to_joins_count} to_joins, {from_joins_count} from_joins

Leave blank to remove all joins of that type.

data_description.to_joins_yaml:
Sends Home Assistant state to Crestron (feedback). Example:
- join: d1
  entity_id: light.kitchen
- join: a1
  entity_id: light.kitchen
  attribute: brightness
data_description.from_joins_yaml:
Runs Home Assistant scripts from Crestron (macros). Example:
- join: d100
  script:
    - service: light.toggle
      target:
        entity_id: light.kitchen

error.invalid_yaml: Invalid YAML syntax. Please check your formatting.
error.invalid_yaml_format:
YAML must be a list format. Example:
- join: d1
  entity_id: light.kitchen
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.
